metadata.name: The Illusion of Control
metadata.description: The video, "The Illusion of Control" is a visual representation of the theme of human's struggle for control in the digital age. The video is showing a person sitting in front of a computer screen, surrounded by a labyrinth of code and wires, attempting to assert their power over the digital world, but ultimately being consumed by it. The video is showing the complexity and the power of technology, as well as how it can be overwhelming for people and how it can consume them. The video highlights the idea that, despite our best efforts, technology and the digital world may have a power over us that we cannot fully understand or control.
